cab.content: (P 8446) From Viceroy, Foreign Department, 19th December 1919. (Received 26th, 11 a.m.) 1708 S. Secret. Following from Kashgar first received .1.4th December: " Further-information has reached me that Afghans are endeavouring to induceMohammedans of Ferghana Syrdaria and Russian Pamirs to join them and Bolsheviksin compact directed against the British. It is also reported that Afghans (corruptgroup) to proclaim possession of part of Russian Pamirs already alluded to in mydiary. I am sending agent there and will keep you informed.%n
